DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the long-term efficacy of radiofrequency catheter ablation in patients with chronic atrial fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Radiofrequency Catheter Ablation for Chronic Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Chronic atrial fibrillation Left atrial diameter >55 mm Left ventricular ejection fraction <0.30 Contraindication to amiodarone therapy or anticoagulation with warfarin Presence of a mechanical prosthetic valve History of a cerebrovascular accident Presence of left atrial thrombus on TEE Prior attempt at catheter or surgical ablation for atrial fibrillation
